## Subnational Analyses

This section deals with sub-national analyses. It will provide guidelines on how to conduct analyses at the Admin_2 (district) level.

We'll look at the following subsections:

-   Coverage at sub-national level

-   Coverage inequalities at the district level

-   Mapping of coverage at the district level
